snippet: “The Lion King” passed “Wicked” as 2013’s top Broadway earner with help from a sophisticated algorithm that calibrates prices based on demand and purchasing patterns.
abstract: The Lion King surpasses Wicked as top-earning Broadway play of 2013, helped by a sophisticated algorithm that calibrates ticket prices based on demand and purchasing patterns; feat is remarkable for long running-musical; success shows how Disney Theatrical Productions has reached a level of sophistication in digital sales that was pioneered by the airline and hotel industries.
lead_paragraph: “The Lion King” passed “Wicked” as 2013’s top Broadway earner with help from a sophisticated algorithm that calibrates prices based on demand and purchasing patterns.

headline.main: Ticket Pricing Puts ‘Lion King’ Atop Broadway’s Circle of Life
headline.print_headline: Ticket Pricing Puts ‘Lion King’ Atop Broadway’s Circle of Life
